SEARCH
Package utils

Class SeleniumWrappers

java.lang.Object
utils.SeleniumWrappers
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasePage, LoginPage, NavMenuPage
public class SeleniumWrappers extends Object
Class used to wrap the existing selenium methods and enhance them with aditional functionalitie, like retry mechanism automatically wait etc New methods can be added based on existing models

  • Method Details

    • sendKeys

      public void sendKeys(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, String value)
      Custom sendKeys method/ Wraps selenium default SendKeys and enhance it with : 1. clear() method before sending the text. 2. waitForElementToBeVisible(element) before any action on webelement
      Parameters:
      locator - --> used inside method to create an WebElement object
      value - --> String value

    • click

      public void click(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method over selenium default click() method enhanced with: 1 .waitForElementToBeClickable(element) method 2. retry mechanism in case of StaleElementReferenceException
      Parameters:
      locator -

    • waitForElementToBeClickable

      public void waitForElementToBeClickable(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Method used to wait for an element to become clickable Expected Condition elementToBeClickable Element
      Parameters:
      element -

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getElement(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)

    • getElementsList

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getElementsList(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)

      Parameters:
      locator -
      Returns:
      list

    • dragAndDrop

      public void dragAndDrop(org.openqa.selenium.By locator, int xAxis, int yAxis)
      Method used to perform drag and drop of an webElement on the x, y axis Makes use of getWebElement() method who waits for element to be visible Triggers hover with Selenium Action class
      Parameters:
      locator - : webElement locator
      xAxis - : horizontal move offset.
      yAxis - : vertical move offset.

    • hoverElement

      public void hoverElement(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Method used to hover over an webElement Makes use of getWebElement() method who waits for element to be visible Triggers hover with Selenium Action class
      Parameters:
      locator -

    • explicitWaitFor

      public void explicitWaitFor(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method over explict wait. Can be called directly when an webelement is needed to be waited for
      Parameters:
      locator -

    • isElementDisplayed

      public boolean isElementDisplayed(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
      Wrapper method over the isDisplayed() method from selenium, enhanced with explicitWait
      Parameters:
      locator -
      Returns:
      boolean state of element checked
